val: The core of the application is built on a Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) model, a type of Recurrent Neural Network optimized for long sequence data retention. After preprocessing, data passes through an embedding layer, then the LSTM layer, and finally a dense layer that classifies statements as humorous or not. Hosted as a web app, this tool provides an interactive interface for users to input sentences and receive humor assessments instantly. The LSTM model achieved an impressive accuracy of 94.62%, This publication in the IEEE Xplore underscores the modelâ€™s potential to contribute to automated humor generation.
